name: Analysis jobs for EC2 Key Pairs

statements.query: MATCH (k:EC2KeyPair) WHERE k.user_uploaded IS NOT NULL REMOVE k.user_uploaded return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (k:EC2KeyPair) WHERE k.duplicate_keyfingerprint IS NOT NULL REMOVE k.duplicate_keyfingerprint return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (k1:EC2KeyPair)-[r:MATCHING_FINGERPRINT]->(k2:EC2KeyPair) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

statements.__comment__: Set EC2KeyPairs with MD5 hash keyfingerprints (47 characters, instead of 59 characters) as user_uploaded = True
statements.query: MATCH (k:EC2KeyPair) WHERE size(k.keyfingerprint) = 47 SET k.user_uploaded = True

statements.__comment__: Attach EC2KeyPairs with matching fingerprints to eachother and set duplicate_keyfingerprint = True
statements.query: MATCH (k1:EC2KeyPair), (k2:EC2KeyPair) WHERE k1.id <> k2.id AND k1.keyfingerprint = k2.keyfingerprint SET k1.duplicate_keyfingerprint = True, k2.duplicate_keyfingerprint = True MERGE (k1)-[r:MATCHING_FINGERPRINT]-(k2) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
